name: Big Questions with Cal Fussman
what_you_do: Cal Fussman is a storyteller, interviewer, and podcaster who engages with influential figures to explore their insights and experiences.
who_you_serve: His audience includes individuals interested in personal development, storytelling, and insights from prominent personalities, appealing to both B2C and B2B segments.
bio: New York Times best-selling author, featured in Esquire Magazine, recognized for interviews with notable figures like Muhammad Ali and Jeff Bezos.
business_focus: Cal Fussman is a storyteller, interviewer, and podcaster who engages with influential figures to explore their insights and experiences. (podcasting)
